name: Out of gas (itch) (mik)
description:
A retro PSX style era horror experience. 

You're driving down the road at night in the middle of the big forest, but you run out of gas. You need to go looking for gas. In the middle of the forest, looking for gas? Good luck

Design, Code, Sound by me

Credits:

  • https://pszemoo.itch.io/
  • https://github.com/Miziziziz/Retro3DGraphicsCollection
  • https://ggbot.itch.io/psx-style-cars
  • https://mixkit.co/free-stock-music/
